SEARCH
Module com.example.umleditor
Package com.example.umleditor.ui.components

Class ClassComponent

java.lang.Object
com.example.umleditor.ui.components.ClassComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ClassComponent extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a class or interface component in a UML class diagram. This class handles the properties and methods related to class components, including rendering, selection, and connections to other class components.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ClassComponent

      public ClassComponent(double x, double y, double width, double height, String name, boolean isInterface)
      Constructs a ClassComponent with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the class component
      y - the y-coordinate of the class component
      width - the width of the class component
      height - the height of the class component
      name - the name of the class or interface
      isInterface - specifies if the component is an interface
